titles.title: Providing for a conditional adjournment of the House of Representatives and a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 193 (Roll no. 207).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 5/20/2004--Passed Senate without amendment. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from May 20 or 21, 2004, until June 1, 2004, and a recess or an adjournment of the Senate from May 20, 21, or 22, 2004, until June 1, 2004.
